creditline: Gift of Harriet and Walter Pratt
description: abstracted image of a woman with large eyes and bobbed dark hair, wearing a medium blue blouse with long sleeves and a white collar with scalloped edge and dark blue skirt (or slacks?); woman holds a small white object in her PR hand; blue ground with sketchy figure in ULC; green element in LRQ; tan beneath woman in LLQ; received in black frame
medium: Watercolor, gouache, and pencil on paper
signed: LRC in pencil: Erich Heckel 12 / Mädchen
title: Mädchen-Siddi
